name: quast
publications: Alexey Gurevich, Vladislav Saveliev, Nikolay Vyahhi and Glenn Tesler, QUAST: quality assessment tool for genome assemblies, Bioinformatics (2013) 29 (8): 1072-1075.
description: Quality Assessment Tool for Genome Assemblies. QUAST performs fast and convenient quality evaluation and comparison of genome assemblies.
